paper_title.ja: 日本企業の環境方針に関与する「受動的」「能動的」な製品デザイナーがエコデザインに果たす役割
paper_title.en: The Role of Passive and Active Product Designers Involved in the Environmental Policy of the Japanese Companies, Toward Eco-Design

description.ja: 日本の中小企業及び大企業において, それぞれの環境方針への関与が「受動的」あるいは「能動的」な製品デザイナーが, 製品開発プロセス上, どのような役割を担っているかをアンケートによって調査し, 環境を考慮した製品の開発やエコデザインに対する彼らの姿勢について考察した。調査の結果, 現在の製品開発プロセスにおいては, 環境を考慮した製品の開発に対する「受動的」なアプローチが主流となっていることがうかがえた。また, 大企業に勤めるデザイナーに比べると, 中小企業に勤めるデザイナーの方が環境を考慮した製品開発に対して「能動的」な姿勢を示していた。使用時に環境を左右する度合いの高い製品の開発に携わっているデザイナーの大部分は, 自社の環境方針に責任を持つ特別なグループを設置した企業に属していたが, その活動に関与しているのは, 積極的なタイプの製品デザイナーよりも消極的なタイプのデザイナーであることが判明した。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to research and analyse the role of the passive and active product designers involved in the environmental policy of small/medium and large Japanese companies, and discuss their attitudes towards environmentally aware product development or eco-design. According to the Survey Results : in the present process of product development, a reactive approach towards environmentally aware product development seemed to be the main stream. Designers of small/medium companies showed more proactive attitude toward environmentally aware product development than designers of large companies. Most of the designers involved in active product, belonged to the companies which had special groups responsible for environmental policy. However, the participation of passive product designers in these activities was more than that of active product designers.

Designers of small/medium companies showed more proactive attitude toward environmentally aware product development than designers of large companies. Most of the designers involved in active product, belonged to the companies which had special groups responsible for environmental policy. However, the participation of passive product designers in these activities was more than that of active product designers.
